name: Elegy-49
flavor_text: SUROS invites you to bring about the end.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Suros imaging technology. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
perks.name: SSO-05 Sniper

perks.description:
Suros scope technology. Medium zoom.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: SSO-07 Sniper

perks.description:
Lightweight scope. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: SSO-08 Sniper

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: Increased accuracy, stability, and handling when firing while crouched.
perks.name: Firmly Planted

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.description: Rapid precision hits temporarily increase stability and reload speed.
perks.name: Rapid Hit

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
perks.name: Triple Tap

perks.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.
perks.name: Ambitious Assassin

perks.description: Projectiles create an area-of-effect detonation on impact.
perks.name: Explosive Payload

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.
perks.name: Outlaw

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target
